property.name: Rules
property.value: When you cast this spell, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Annihilator 2 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. Its controller creates a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and enchantments. Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ixidor had only to imagine their ruin and Akroma made it so.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Join forces - Starting with you, each player may pay any amount of mana. Each player creates X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens, where X is the total amount of mana paid this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Each opponent who cast a spell this turn can't attack with creatures. Each opponent who attacked with a creature this turn can't cast spells.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance When Arbiter of Knollridge enters the battlefield, each player's life total becomes the highest life total among all players.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though giants are mortal, they live so long and on such a grand scale that many small folk don't believe they ever truly die.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying As Archangel of Strife enters the battlefield, each player chooses war or peace. Creatures controlled by players who chose war get +3/+0. Creatures controlled by players who chose peace get +0/+3.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose two - • Destroy all artifacts. • Destroy all enchantments. • Destroy all creatures with mana value 3 or less. • Destroy all creatures with mana value 4 or greater.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Radiance - Choose a color. Target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Truth shines even in darkness. Those who march on the side of truth walk always in righteous light."

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each upkeep, you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wishing upon only one star seems like a failure of imagination." - Vish Kal, Blood Arbiter

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player gains 2 life for each creature on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In the gathering there is strength for all who founder, renewal for all who languish, love for all who sing." - Song of All, canto 642

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each upkeep, put a strife counter on Crescendo of War. Attacking creatures get +1/+0 for each strife counter on Crescendo of War. Blocking creatures you control get +1/+0 for each strife counter on Crescendo of War.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When False Prophet dies, exile all creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You lived for Serra's love. Will you not die for it?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May the memory of our fallen heroes ensnare the violent hearts of lesser men." - Great Threshold of Monserkat inscription

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Destroy all nontoken creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ravnica, like a hedge, must be pruned, leaving only leaves of verdant uniformity." - Niszka, Selesnya evangel

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cumulative upkeep - Put two cards from a single graveyard on the bottom of their owner's library. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Journey to Nowhere enters the battlefield, exile target creature. When Journey to Nowhere leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Multikicker {W} (You may pay an additional {W} any number of times as you cast this spell.) Flying When Lightkeeper of Emeria enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life for each time it was kicked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Martyr's Bond or another nonland permanent you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a permanent that shares a card type with it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our lives are connected by divine law. The truth of this will be made evident in time." - Zedruu the Greathearted

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Monk Realist enters the battlefield, destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We plant the seeds of doubt to harvest the crop of wisdom."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The owner of target nonland permanent shuffles it into their library, then draws two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A richer people could give more but they could never give as much."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Oblivion Ring enters the battlefield, exile another target nonland permanent. When Oblivion Ring leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.) Destroy target artifact or enchantment. If this spell was kicked, it deals damage equal to that permanent's mana value to target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. Clash with an opponent. If you win, creatures that player controls don't untap during the player's next untap step. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher mana value.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated. Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, you may attach Prison Term to that creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target artifact or enchantment. If you cast this spell during your main phase, you may exile up to one other target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some timelines forever fray, branch, and intermingle. Others end abruptly.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature attacks, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Until the world unites in vengeful fury and Phage is destroyed, I will not stay my hand." - Akroma, angelic avenger

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Perfect justice in service of a perfect will.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever a land enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, you may gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She preaches the blessings of the Machine Orthodoxy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}, Sacrifice Soul Snare: Exile target creature that's attacking you or a planeswalker you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Body and spirit are sworn enemies. They will take any excuse to be rid of each other." - Tariel, Reckoner of Souls

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Return two target cards from an opponent's graveyard to their hand. Destroy target attacking creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create X 1/1 white Pegasus creature tokens with flying, where X is your life total.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When you hear thunder on a cloudless day, take cover and brace for the coming of the storm herd." - Skotov, Tin Street basket vendor

property.value: Flying As Voice of All enters the battlefield, choose a color. Voice of All has protection from the chosen color.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has vigilance, and can't attack you or planeswalkers you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I prefer loyalty to be a matter of respect, not of magic. But one does what one must." - Kaalia of the Vast

property.value: Defender When Wall of Omens enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I search for a vision of Zendikar that does not include the Eldrazi." - Expedition journal entry

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Her voice is justice, clear and relentless." - Akroma, angelic avenger

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Conundrum Sphinx attacks, each player chooses a card name. Then each player reveals the top card of their library. If the card a player revealed has the name they chose, that player puts it into their hand. If it doesn't, that player puts it on the bottom of their library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance When Court Hussar enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library, then put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. When Court Hussar enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless {W} was spent to cast it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player mills X cards, where X is the number of cards in their hand.

property.value: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Try to pretend like you understand what's important."

property.value: Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {1}. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

property.value: It lingers near the outposts of the Makindi Trenches, inadvertently granting another layer of defense.

property.value: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, that player mills two cards.

property.value: "The Filigree Texts do not compel you to act in accordance with their precepts. They only specify the consequences should you fail." - Lodus of the Ethersworn

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw two cards, then sacrifice a permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the School of the Unseen fell, so many magical treasures lay abandoned that no amount of death could deter the stream of thieves and desperate scholars.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You've failed Gerrard. You've failed the Legacy. You've failed yourself. I can do no more." - Volrath, to Karn

property.value: Untap target creature an opponent controls and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn. When you lose control of the creature, tap it.

property.value: Fools surrender their sanity to his riddles. Even greater fools try to solve them.

property.value: Target opponent draws two cards, then you draw up to four cards. That opponent may repeat this process as many times as they choose.

property.value: Trample When Trench Gorger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for any number of land cards, exile them, then shuffle. If you do, Trench Gorger has base power and base toughness each equal to the number of cards exiled this way.

property.value: The wise always keep an ear open to the whispers of power.

property.value: The void is without substance but cuts like steel.

property.value: "Why do you weep for the dead? I rejoice, for they have died for me."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Grixis is a world where the only things found in abundance are death and decay. Corpses, whole or in part, are the standard currency among necromancers and demons.

property.value: Put any number of target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Granted, it's the pinnacle of utter destructiveness. So what would you call two of them?" - Riku of Two Reflections

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, trample Join forces - Whenever Mana-Charged Dragon attacks or blocks, each player starting with you may pay any amount of mana. Mana-Charged Dragon gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the total amount of mana paid this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste At the beginning of your upkeep, return a red creature you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The oni leapt easily from peak to peak, toying with its victims, its voice a purr from the rumbling depths of nightmare.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Punishing Fire deals 2 damage to any target. Whenever an opponent gains life, you may pay {R}. If you do, return Punishing Fire from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of the end step, if no creatures are on the battlefield, sacrifice Pyrohemia. {R}: Pyrohemia deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Rapacious One deals combat damage to a player, create that many 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We have built a wall upon sand. The wall will vanish. The sand will remain." - Oracle en-Vec

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Spitebellows leaves the battlefield, it deals 6 damage to target creature. Evoke {1}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Disaster stalks with gaping jaws across unready lands.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your opponents can't search libraries. If an opponent would begin an extra turn, that player skips that turn instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The correct answer to a barbarian's riddle is to choke on your cleverness and die.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sulfurous Blast deals 2 damage to each creature and each player. If you cast this spell during your main phase, Sulfurous Blast deals 3 damage to each creature and each player instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Keldons used the toxic vents in the cracked earth to bolster their home's defenses.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has first strike, and can't attack you or planeswalkers you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ruhan would never agree to such terms." - Ruhan of the Fomori

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may choose new targets for target instant or sorcery spell. Then copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I knew that trick long before your great-grandmother's great-grandmother was born."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) When Acidic Slime enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Graft 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.) {G}: Target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it gains reach until end of turn. (It can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may create a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ground erupted in time with the hedron's thrum, a dirge of the last days.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Baloth Woodcrasher gets +4/+4 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its insatiable hunger quickly depletes a region of prey. It must migrate from place to place to feed its massive bulk.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a 1/1 green Snake creature token, a 2/2 green Wolf creature token, and a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My battle cry reaches ears far keener than yours." - Saidah, Joraga hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample As long as Brawn is in your graveyard and you control a Forest, creatures you control have trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "‘I have arrived,' bellowed Brawn, and the plane shuddered." - Scroll of Beginnings

property.name: Rules
property.value: If a noncreature permanent under your control was destroyed this turn by a spell or ability an opponent controlled, you may pay {G} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Create four 1/1 green Snake creature tokens.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Join forces - Starting with you, each player may pay any amount of mana. Each player searches their library for up to X basic land cards, where X is the total amount of mana paid this way, puts them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffles.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All seeds share a common bond, calling to each other across infinity.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vanishing 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.) When Deadwood Treefolk enters or leaves the battlefield, return another target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {G}{G}{G}. Forestcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Eternal Witness enters the battlefield, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She remembers every word spoken, from the hero's oath to the baby's cry.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Torching Krosa would be pointless. It grows faster than it burns.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fertilid enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. {1}{G}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Fertilid: Target player searches their library for a basic land card, puts it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffles.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Fierce Empath enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card with mana value 6 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Fists of Ironwood enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens. Enchanted creature has trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Saprolings add the three and the four to the "one-two punch."

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Untap two target lands. −1: Create a 3/3 green Beast creature token. −4: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Words lie. People lie. The land tells the truth."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, deathtouch When Hornet Queen enters the battlefield, create four 1/1 green Insect creature tokens with flying and deathtouch.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a 4/4 green Beast creature token. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Hydra Omnivore deals combat damage to an opponent, it deals that much damage to each other opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We should learn from the hydra. It never plays favorites; it devours everyone equally." - Thrass, elder druid

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you control a Forest, rather than pay this spell's mana cost, you may have an opponent gain 3 life. Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The land grows only where the kami will it." - Dosan the Falling Leaf

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cycling {2}{G} ({2}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Krosan Tusker, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle. (Do this before you draw.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lhurgoyf's power is equal to the number of creature cards in all graveyards and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ach! Hans, run! It's the lhurgoyf!" - Saffi Eriksdotter, last words

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's precombat main phase, that player adds {G}{G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Battered and beaten by years of salt and claw, he never ceased to walk, and to seed. Only now, in this time of rebirth, do his seeds take root.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach When Penumbra Spider dies, create a 2/4 black Spider creature token with reach.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or enchantment and up to one other target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There are many ruins, but there used to be many more.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Sakura-Tribe Elder: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Slain warriors were buried with a tree sapling, so they would become a part of the forest after death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}: Exile target card from a graveyard. If it was a creature card, put a +1/+1 counter on Scavenging Ooze and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In nature, not a single bone or scrap of flesh goes to waste.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Spawnwrithe deals combat damage to a player, create a token that's a copy of Spawnwrithe.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its victims feel only an itchy, wriggling feeling just under their skin. By then, it's far too late.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spike Feeder enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Feeder: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Feeder: You gain 2 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}: Squallmonger deals 1 damage to each creature with flying and each player. Any player may activate this ability.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Squall, gale, hurricane - it's all a matter of size . . . and price."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Symbiotic Wurm dies, create seven 1/1 green Insect creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The insects keep the wurm's hide free from parasites. In return, the wurm doesn't eat the insects.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each opponent sacrifices an artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You may enter, but leave those lifeless things of your world behind." - Modruni, maro-sorcerer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) {1}{G}: Regenerate Troll Ascetic.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's no coincidence that the oldest trolls are also the angriest.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Veteran Explorer dies, each player may search their library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3, has trample, and can't attack you or planeswalkers you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Savagery is the birthright of every creature that draws breath - or wishes it could." - Karador, Ghost Chieftain

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Yavimaya Elder dies, you may search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle. {2}, Sacrifice Yavimaya Elder: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Angel of Despair enters the battlefield, destroy target permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I feel in them a sense of duty and commitment, yet I can feel nothing else. It is as if their duty is to an empty void." - Razia, Boros archangel

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from white and from black Whenever you cast a creature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Animar, Soul of Elements. Creature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each +1/+1 counter on Animar.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gaea forged her soldiers into self-wielding weapons that struck down all impurities.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{W}: Tap target creature. {2}{U}: Counter target activated ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Players can't cast spells during combat. {R}: Target creature attacks this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why listen to the mumblings of wizards when the lash speaks true?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Bladewing the Risen enters the battlefield, you may return target Dragon permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield. {B}{R}: Dragon creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{R}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn. {1}{W}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lifelink {R}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Brion Stoutarm deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a 5/5 blue and red Elemental creature token with flying. Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It hears and answers every orison across Shadowmoor.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.) As an additional cost to cast creature spells, you may pay any amount of mana. If you do, that creature enters the battlefield with that many additional +1/+1 counters on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are many, yet one. We are separate in body, yet speak with a single voice. Join us in our chorus."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +4/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Never corner a barbarian. You become the path of least resistance." - Sarkhan Vol

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch Skip your draw step. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have fewer than seven cards in hand, draw cards equal to the difference.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ask your query and be on your way. Just don't look her in the eye.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. Create X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens, where X is that creature's mana value.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Desecrator Hag enters the battlefield, return to your hand the creature card in your graveyard with the greatest power. If two or more cards are tied for greatest power, you choose one of them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Loose earth is not a burial but an appetizer.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, you may gain control of target permanent until end of turn. If you do, untap it and it gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nothing is truly your own. It is his, whether you know it or not." - The Seer's Parables

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Duergar Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Mountains, you may destroy target artifact. When Duergar Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Plains, you may destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature deals combat damage to one of your opponents, its controller may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am not at liberty to reveal my sources, but I can assure you, the price on your head is high."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Electrolyze deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Izzet learn something from every lesson they teach.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Firespout deals 3 damage to each creature without flying if {R} was spent to cast this spell and 3 damage to each creature with flying if {G} was spent to cast this spell. (Do both if {R}{G} was spent.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ghave, Guru of Spores enters the battlefield with five +1/+1 counters on it. {1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from a creature you control: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token. {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. {4}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Gwyllion Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Plains, you may create a 1/1 white Kithkin Soldier creature token. When Gwyllion Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Swamps, you may put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Destroy target artifact. • Destroy target enchantment. • Destroy target artifact and target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Crovax knows we're coming now," said a grinning Sisay. "I just sent the Predator crashing into his stronghold."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Intet, the Dreamer deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{U}. If you do, exile the top card of your library face down. You may look at that card for as long as it remains exiled. You may play that card without paying its mana cost for as long as Intet remains on the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Izzet Chronarch enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He ensures not only whether but also when and where the lightning strikes twice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Kaalia of the Vast attacks an opponent, you may put an Angel, Demon, or Dragon creature card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking that opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'll have my revenge if I have to call on every force from above and below."

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature card in your graveyard. Once during each of your turns, you may cast a creature spell from your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Death tried to uncrown me. But now I return, king of a greater realm."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Malfegor enters the battlefield, discard your hand. Each opponent sacrifices a creature for each card discarded this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A demon cannot be trusted, and a dragon will not be ruled.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cast this spell only before attackers are declared. You choose which creatures attack this turn. You choose which creatures block this turn and how those creatures block.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As The Mimeoplasm enters the battlefield, you may exile two creature cards from graveyards. If you do, it enters the battlefield as a copy of one of those cards with a number of additional +1/+1 counters on it equal to the power of the other card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The eyes let flow with tears, then blood, then the very soul - the whole wrung inside out, dripping down into the blackened puddle of the past.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those may be the squirms of one life ending or of another beginning. Either way, I'd leave it alone." - Rakka Mar

property.name: Rules
property.value: {X}{U}{R}, {T}: Nin, the Pain Artist deals X damage to target creature. That creature's controller draws X cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your body is a delicate instrument that tells me truths. These devices help me ‘tune' that instrument."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Nucklavee enters the battlefield, you may return target red sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. When Nucklavee enters the battlefield, you may return target blue instant card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It loathes all tastes but two: spells and flesh.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Numot, the Devastator deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, destroy up to two target lands.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Oros, the Avenger deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{W}. If you do, Oros deals 3 damage to each nonwhite creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{W}: Target player gains 1 life. {2}{B}: Each player loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It was vast, a great sheet of soaring wings, and equally silent. It caught us unawares and blocked our view of the kithkin stronghold." - Grensch, merrow cutthroat

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prophetic Bolt deals 4 damage to any target. Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may pay {U}{R}. If you do, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. Whenever another nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {G}{U}. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose an opponent at random. Ruhan of the Fomori attacks that player this combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Unfettered by allegiance, driven by war.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Savage Twister deals X damage to each creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Frozen, we watched the funnel pluck up three of the goats - pook! pook! pook! - before we ran for the wadi." - Travelogue of Najat

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The clamor of the city drowns all voices. But together we can sing a harmony that will resonate from Ravnica's tallest spires to her deepest wells."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{G}: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token. {3}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature is 1/1, put two +1/+1 counters on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One sigil awarded for valor, the other awarded for surviving Hellkite's Pass."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, trample Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We've bred out the shortcomings of the species' natural form and replaced them with assets of our own design." - Momir Vig

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Whenever Skullbriar, the Walking Grave deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Counters remain on Skullbriar as it moves to any zone other than a player's hand or library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying If Szadek, Lord of Secrets would deal combat damage to a player, instead put that many +1/+1 counters on Szadek and that player mills that many cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, vigilance {T}: Choose a creature card at random from target opponent's graveyard. Put that card onto the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "After death you face paradise, damnation, or Tariel." - Priest's teaching

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Teneb, the Harvester deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{B}. If you do, put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've seen death before. My mother succumbing to illness, my comrades bleeding on the battlefield . . . But I'd never seen anything as dreadful as that." - Taani, berserker of Etlan

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mountaincycling {2}, forestcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Mountain or Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand. If you return a nonland card to your hand this way, Vengeful Rebirth deals damage equal to that card's mana value to any target. Exile Vengeful Rebirth.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, lifelink Sacrifice a creature: Put X +1/+1 counters on Vish Kal, Blood Arbiter, where X is the sacrificed creature's power. Remove all +1/+1 counters from Vish Kal: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn for each +1/+1 counter removed this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Vorosh, the Hunter deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{G}. If you do, put six +1/+1 counters on Vorosh.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever a card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, put a +1/+1 counter on Vulturous Zombie.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When something dies, all things benefit. Well okay, just our things." - Ezoc, Golgari rot farmer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender, flying Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It provides what every discerning mage requires - time to think.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rakdos festivals almost leave enough rubble in their wake to hide the bodies.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Islandwalk, swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island or a Swamp.) Whenever Wrexial, the Risen Deep deals combat damage to a player, you may cast target instant or sorcery card from that player's graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that spell would be put into a graveyard, exile it instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain X life and draw X cards, where X is the number of permanents you own that your opponents control. {U}{R}{W}: Target opponent gains control of target permanent you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}: Acorn Catapult deals 1 damage to any target. That permanent's controller or that player creates a 1/1 green Squirrel creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Kalonian word for "ammunition" is the same as the word for "bait."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Armillary Sphere: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mysterious purpose of two of the rings had eluded Esper mages - until now.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Have you ever held a Boros signet? There's a weight to it that belies its size - a weight of strength and of pride." - Agrus Kos

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Indestructible (Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy this artifact.) {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An emblem of a secret guild, the Dimir insignia is seen only by its own members - and the doomed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}{C}{C}. {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Dreamstone Hedron: Draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only the Eldrazi mind thinks in the warped paths required to open the hedrons and tap the power within.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What do you have that I cannot obtain?" - Mairsil, the Pretender

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Depending on your point of view, the seal represents a proud guardian of the natural cycle or one who has sold her soul to darkness for eternal life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gruul territorial markings need not be legible. The blood, snot, and muck used to smear them are unmistakably Gruul.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's draw step, if Howling Mine is untapped, that player draws an additional card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mine's riches never end, nor do the moans of the spirits doomed to haunt them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Izzet signet is redesigned often, each time becoming closer to a vanity portrait of Niv-Mizzet.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature has haste and shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Equip {0}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After lightning struck the cliffs, the ore became iron, the iron became steel, and the steel became greaves. The lightning never left.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}, {T}: Put a fate counter on target permanent. {5}, {T}, Sacrifice Oblivion Stone: Destroy each nonland permanent without a fate counter on it, then remove all fate counters from all permanents.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The form of the sigil is just as important as the sigil itself. If it's carried on a medallion, its bearer is a master. If it's tattooed on the body, its bearer is a slave.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Prophetic Prism enters the battlefield, draw a card. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The explorer who found it got a bad deal when he sold it. He merely got rich."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Made of bone and boiled in blood, a Rakdos signet is not considered finished until it has been used as a murder weapon.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The symbol of the Conclave is one of unity, with tree supporting sun and sun feeding tree.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the Simic Combine, its sigil serves not as an emblem of honor but as a trademark. Its familiar image on any biological commodity attests to superb craftsmanship, ingenious innovation, and higher cost.

property.name: Rules
Flavor
property.value: The mind is a beautiful bounty encased in an annoying bone container.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lost to time is the artificer's art of trapping light from a distant star in a ring of purest gold.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Solemn Simulacrum enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. When Solemn Simulacrum dies, you may draw a card.
